thread.title: BRIEF-Dr Pepper Snapple Group To Cancel Webcast Conference Call And Slide Presentation On Fourth Quarter

title: BRIEF-Dr Pepper Snapple Group To Cancel Webcast Conference Call And Slide Presentation On Fourth Quarter

organizations.name: reuters) - dr pepper snapple group inc

text:
41 PM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-Dr Pepper Snapple Group To Cancel Webcast Conference Call And Slide Presentation On Fourth Quarter Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Dr Pepper Snapple Group Inc: 
* DR PEPPER SNAPPLE GROUP TO CANCEL WEBCAST CONFERENCE CALL AND SLIDE PRESENTATION ON FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 EARNINGS 
* DR PEPPER SNAPPLE GROUP INC - CURRENTLY IN A PROXY FILING PROCESS RELATED TO MERGER WITH MAPLE PARENT HOLDINGS CORP 
* DR PEPPER SNAPPLE GROUP INC - WILL FILE ITS 2017 FORM 10-K WITH SEC BEFORE MARKET OPENS ON FEBRUARY 14, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
